comments.comments_text: This is really unlucky! Ruben Loftus-Cheek (Chelsea) attempted to clear the ball away after the opposition’s corner kick into the box, but instead miskicked the clearance and put it into his own net, specifically into the roof of the net. He won't enjoy watching the highlights later.

comments.comments_text: It's a goal! Kai Havertz (Chelsea) makes it 3:1. He jumped highest to connect with a perfect cross from Conor Gallagher and planted his close-range header into the middle of the goal. Robert Sanchez was helpless.
